text: Ra allahale timila'i pradana gareko granthama adesa garisakeko cha ki jaba timi kunai sabha va baithakama allahaka ayataharula'i asvikara garirakheko va tinako upahasa garirakheko suna, taba tyasa sabhama tiniharuko sathama nabasa, jabasam'ma tiniharu arko kura garna thaldainan. (An'yatha) timi pani tyasabela tiniharu jastai bha'ihalnechau. Yasama kunai sandeha chaina ki allaha sabai munaphika ra kaphiraharula'i narkama ekatrita garnecha
